Text: just logged on here to warn everyone what an epic sack of shit this series was.  If you have seen nothing of it yet, then do not start now.  these are precious minutes of your life that you will never get back.  Actually sit through an episode of this offensive bile, and you may never forgive yourself.  Do not download or watch this crap.  Seeders, for the love of fucking christ,  please let this shit die.
